description: Presents the Kids on the Block, a unique group of puppets in that one is deaf, one blind and another in a wheelchair. They tour the country encouraging non-disabled children to ask and learn about their handicapped peers and to see the world through different eyes. Stars Gary Burghoff (from TV's MASH) and was made during an actual classroom presentation. Suitable for middle and upper primary and lower secondary levels.
